review: Not too long ago I finally bought a patch cord to hook up my laptop to our TV for watching videos, NetFlix, etc. but it was always a pain to get up to pause it when the phone rang, the doorbell rang, or when nature called. Anyway, using Google Chromecast is a breeze, it works fantastically, and you can control everything from your laptop ... which as the name would have it, is often right in your lap.Buy it - you'll love it.
